Posts.Content: I also have bone mets and get my scans every 6 months unless there is an increase in pain.  My onc explained that when starting a new drug it can take up to 6 months to see if it is working or not.  If your mother is in pain I would insist on a scan, it is very hard to be patient when dealing with this disease. Best wishes
Posts.Title: Does anyone know how often a CT/PET & MRI should be given when taking Femara?

Posts.Content: It can be.  Some people do experience a burning feeling, but there usually is a lump too.  If you are concerned I would make an appt. with your doc. just to be sure because the worrying will drive you crazy.  Good luck. Tam
